description: Summarizes fundamental financial analysis data into a narrative.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: The ID or name of the company.

parameters.name: financial_health
parameters.description: The assessed financial health (e.g., Strong, Moderate, Weak).

parameters.name: ratios_summary
parameters.description: A string summarizing key financial ratios.

parameters.name: comps_valuation_summary
parameters.description: A string summarizing comparable company valuation.

parameters.name: user_provided_key_insights_or_conclusion_prompt
parameters.description: User-provided specific points to include or a prompt for the conclusion.
parameters.defaultValue: Provide a brief overall conclusion based on the data.
